tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_reality_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(255),
    tournament_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE game_events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    event_score INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE tournaments (
    tournament_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    tournament_date DATE NOT NULL,
    prize_pool DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    winner_id INT NOT NULL,
    runner_up_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS players (
    player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    join_date DATE NOT NULL,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    event_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tournament_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id UUID NOT NULL,
    player_id UUID NOT NULL,
    event_id UUID NOT NULL,
    result_duration INTERVAL,
    result_rank INT,
    result_prize DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (tournament_id) REFERENCES tournaments (tournament_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players (player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events (event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tournaments (
    tournament_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(255),
    tournament_date DATE,
    tournament_location VARCHAR(255),
    total_prize_money DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  game_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  event_location TEXT,
  event_prize MONEY
);

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  player_email TEXT,
  player_country TEXT,
  player_join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tournaments (
  tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tournament_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  tournament_date DATE NOT NULL,
  tournament_location TEXT,
  game_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  tournament_prize MONEY
);

CREATE TABLE games (
  game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  game_developer TEXT,
  game_genre TEXT,
  game_release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tournament_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  result_rank INT,
  result_prize MONEY
);
